001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ICollectionValue;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IArrayItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IMapItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
020
021import java.util.Collection;
022import java.util.List;
023import java.util.stream.Collectors;
024import java.util.stream.Stream;
025
026import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
027
028public final class MapFind {
029  private static final String NAME = "find";
030  @NonNull
031  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
032      .name(NAME)
033      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_MAP)
034      .deterministic()
035      .contextIndependent()
036      .focusIndependent()
037      .argument(IArgument.builder()
038          .name("input")
039          .type(IItem.class)
040          .zeroOrMore()
041          .build())
042      .argument(IArgument.builder()
043          .name("key")
044          .type(IAnyAtomicItem.class)
045          .one()
046          .build())
047      .returnType(IArrayItem.class)
048      .returnOne()
049      .functionHandler(MapFind::execute)
050      .build();
051
052  private MapFind() {
053    // disable construction
054  }
055
056  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
057  @NonNull
058  private static ISequence<?> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
059      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
060      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
061      IItem focus) {
062    ISequence<?> input = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
063    IAnyAtomicItem key = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
064
065    return ISequence.of(IArrayItem.ofCollection(
066        ObjectUtils.notNull(find((Collection<? extends IItem>) input, key)
067            .collect(Collectors.toList()))));
068  }
069
070  /**
071   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
072   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-find">map:find</a>.
073   *
074   * @param items
075   *          the item sequence to search for key matches
076   * @param key
077   *          the key for the item to retrieve
078   * @return the retrieved item
079   */
080  @NonNull
081  public static Stream<ICollectionValue> find(
082      @NonNull Collection<? extends IItem> items,
083      @NonNull IAnyAtomicItem key) {
084    return ObjectUtils.notNull(items.stream()
085        // handle item
086        .flatMap(item -> find(ObjectUtils.notNull(item), key)));
087  }
088
089  /**
090   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
091   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-find">map:find</a>.
092   *
093   * @param item
094   *          the item to search for key matches
095   * @param key
096   *          the key for the item to retrieve
097   * @return the retrieved item
098   */
099  @NonNull
100  public static Stream<ICollectionValue> find(
101      @NonNull IItem item,
102      @NonNull IAnyAtomicItem key) {
103    Stream<ICollectionValue> retval;
104    if (item instanceof IArrayItem) {
105      IArrayItem<?> array = (IArrayItem<?>) item;
106      retval = ObjectUtils.notNull(array.stream()
107          // handle array values
108          .flatMap(value -> find(ObjectUtils.notNull(value), key)));
109    } else if (item instanceof IMapItem) {
110      IMapItem<?> map = (IMapItem<?>) item;
111      // handle map
112      retval = find(map, key);
113    } else {
114      // do nothing
115      retval = ObjectUtils.notNull(Stream.empty());
116    }
117    return retval;
118  }
119
120  @NonNull
121  private static Stream<ICollectionValue> find(
122      @NonNull ICollectionValue value,
123      @NonNull IAnyAtomicItem key) {
124    Stream<ICollectionValue> retval;
125    if (value instanceof ISequence) {
126      ISequence<?> sequence = (ISequence<?>) value;
127      // handle sequence items
128      retval = find((Collection<? extends IItem>) sequence, key);
129    } else {
130      // handle item
131      retval = find((IItem) value, key);
132    }
133    return retval;
134  }
135
136  /**
137   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
138   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-find">map:find</a>.
139   * <p>
140   * This is a specialized method for processing an item that is a map item, which
141   * can be searched for a key in a much more efficient way.
142   *
143   * @param item
144   *          the item to search for key matches
145   * @param key
146   *          the key for the item to retrieve
147   * @return the retrieved item
148   */
149  @NonNull
150  public static Stream<ICollectionValue> find(
151      @NonNull IMapItem<?> item,
152      @NonNull IAnyAtomicItem key) {
153    return ObjectUtils.notNull(Stream.concat(
154        // add matching value, if it exists
155        Stream.ofNullable(MapGet.get(item, key)),
156        item.values().stream()
157            // handle map values
158            .flatMap(value -> find(ObjectUtils.notNull(value), key))));
159  }
160}
